nodes.text: Ody Mandrell's Podracer was a simple but speedy Podracer with engines designed by Exelbrok.

Ody Mandrell used it in 32 BBY. In the Boonta Eve Classic race of that year, one of Mandrell's pit droids, DUM-4, wrecked the engine by walking in front of it when Ody took a pit stop. DUM-4 was sucked in, and the engine exploded.
